name: Bosco
aboutMe: Hello! I am Bosco, an aspiring, self-motivated software engineer who has a strong interest in building scalable software that has positive impact on society and the environment.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Fellow (Jupyterlab)
experiences.descriptions: Implemented new features in the Git extension on Jupyterlab, such as multiple file selection, multiple remote repo support and commit graph visualization

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.descriptions: Built a backend framework to automate work processes using Google App Script which integrates Shopify and Hubspot services through REST API and GraphQL

experiences.title: DevOps Intern
experiences.descriptions: Extended backend API functionalities, Developed story pop-ups on React front-end, Deployed backend updates in AWS EC2

hobbies.name: piano
hobbies.description: I love playing piano! My favourite composers are Mozart, Back, Tchaikovsky and Beethoven. I also play anime songs.

educations.school: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

name: Sarah
aboutMe: Hello! I'm Sarah! I'm a former veteran teacher, a career changer, and a Latina in tech. I have a passion for front end development, UI/UX design, and accessibility.

experiences.title: Site Reliability Engineering Fellow
experiences.descriptions: Learned about SRE technologies including Python and Flask.

hobbies.name: gardening
hobbies.description: I care for over 100 cacti and succulents!
